message.content:
{"id": "13620", 
"title": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space", 
"description": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is positioned with a significant amount of white space in the middle of the page. This affects the vertical alignment of the label.", 
"OB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label positioned in the middle with excessive white space. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.", 
"EB": "", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue: \n1) Load a project from the repository \n2) Select a source folder \n3) Open Properties \n4) Navigate to Java Source Attachment \n5) An info label will be displayed in the middle of the dialog."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

It's verticalAlignmentshould be set to SWT.ALIGNBEGINNING.STEPS1) Load a project from the repository2) Select a source folder3) Open Properties4) Select Java Source Attachment5 [details]) You will get an info label in the middle of the dialog. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': "It's verticalAlignmentshould be set to SWT.ALIGNBEGINNING.STEPS1) Load a project from the repository2) Select a source folder3) Open Properties4) Select Java Source Attachment5 [details]) You will get an info label in the middle of the dialog.
